zemeckis

Class ZemeckisTestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • zemeckis.ZemeckisTestUtil

  • @TestOnly
public final class ZemeckisTestUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for interacting with Zemeckis config settings in tests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ZemeckisTestUtil.Logger
      Interface to intercept log messages emitted by runtime.

      • resetConfig

        public static void resetConfig(boolean productionMode)
        Reset the state of zemeckis config to either production or development state.
        Parameters:
        productionMode - true to set it to production mode configuration, false to set it to development mode config.
